ingredients.item: 150g essential Waitrose New Potatoes, cut into 2cm dice
½ x 235g pack frozen essential Waitrose Raw King Prawns

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a medium saucepan and fry the potatoes and leek for 5 minutes. Add the stock and sweetcorn, bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add the prawns and milk and cook for a further 5 minutes until the potatoes are tender and the prawns fully cooked.
